name: Battle/Fight 404
description:
In a dimensional battle for the glory of mankind, AI warriors risk obliteration to earn the title of Champion.

Watch the fights unfold, as two flat images pretend to slap each other.

Choose from the list of default characters, or import your own custom image. No further input necessary.

To support this game on Patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/amazeovision

Note: This is a work-in progress, currently a prototype.

I do not own Pokemon.
